bool.h File Reference

A user supplied file to define bool type. More...

Detailed Description

A user supplied file to define bool type.

Because there are compilers without standard C99 stdbool.h implementatuon it is needed to provide some intermediate file to allow SST to use bool type.
The simplest content of this file can be #include <stdbool.h>
The SST implementation uses three elements of boolean facility:

  • bool type
  • true constant
  • false constant
Generated on Sat Dec 30 18:21:36 2006 for SST by  1.5.1
